Package io.github.pitzzahh.atm.dao

Interface AtmDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
InDatabase, InMemory
public interface AtmDAO
interface used to access the database. Implemented by InDatabase. Used in AtmService
See Also:
  • InDatabase
  • AtmService

  • Method Details

    • setDataSource

      default Consumer<DataSource> setDataSource() throws RuntimeException
      Function that accepts a DataSource object. Object needed to connect to the database.
      Returns:
      nothing
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if failed to connect to the database.
      See Also:
      • Consumer
      • DataSource

    • getAllClients

      Supplier<Map<String,Client>> getAllClients()
      Function that supplies a Map<String, Client>.

      String - the key, the key is the account number of the client

      Client - the value, the value is the client object

      Returns:
      a Client object
      See Also:
      • Map
      • Supplier
      • Client

    • getClientByAccountNumber

      Function<String,Client> getClientByAccountNumber() throws IllegalArgumentException
      Function that returns a Optional<Client> object based on the String that contains the account number.

      T - a String containing the account number to be search from the database.

      R - a Optional<Client> containing the result if the client is found or not.

      Returns:
      a Optional<Client> object.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the account number does not belong to any client.
      See Also:
      • Function
      • Client

    • getClientSavingsByAccountNumber

      Function<String,Double> getClientSavingsByAccountNumber()
      Function that accepts a String containing the account number. The account number will be used to search for the clients savings.
      Returns:
      a Double containing the savings of the client with the account number.
      See Also:
      • Function

    • removeClientByAccountNumber

      Function<String,io.github.pitzzahh.util.utilities.classes.enums.Status> removeClientByAccountNumber()
      Function that removes a client in the database using the account number.

      T - a String the account number of the client needed in order to remove the client.

      R - the Status of the operation if Status.SUCCESS or Status.ERROR.

      Returns:
      a Status of the query whether Status.SUCCESS or Status.ERROR.
      See Also:
      • Function
      • Status

    • removeAllClients

      Supplier<io.github.pitzzahh.util.utilities.classes.enums.Status> removeAllClients()
      Function that removes all the clients in the database.
      Returns:
      a Status of the query whether Status.SUCCESS or Status.ERROR.
      See Also:
      • Supplier
      • Status

    • updateClientStatusByAccountNumber

      BiFunction<String,Boolean,io.github.pitzzahh.util.utilities.classes.enums.Status> updateClientStatusByAccountNumber()
      Function that accepts two values. A String and a Boolean.

      First parameter is a String contains the account number of the client.

      Second parameter is a Boolean, true if the client account should be locked, default is false.

      Returns:
      a Status of the query whether Status.SUCCESS or Status.ERROR.
      See Also:
      • BiFunction
      • Status

    • updateClientSavingsByAccountNumber

      BiFunction<String,Double,io.github.pitzzahh.util.utilities.classes.enums.Status> updateClientSavingsByAccountNumber()
      Function that accepts two values. A String and a Double.

      First parameter is a String contains the account number of the client.

      Second parameter is a Double, the new savings balance of the client.

      Returns:
      a Status of the query whether Status.SUCCESS or Status.ERROR.
      See Also:
      • BiFunction
      • Status

    • getAllLoans

      Supplier<Map<String,List<Loan>>> getAllLoans()
      Function that returns a key value pair, a Map<String, List<Loan>> in particular.

      K - is a String containing the key, the key is the account number of the client who requested a loan.

      V - is a String containing the value, the value is all the loans that the account requested. It is a List<Loan>

      Returns:
      a Map<String, List<Loan>> a key value pair containing all the loans from the table in the database.
      See Also:
      • Supplier
      • Map
      • List
      • Loan

    • getLoanByLoanNumberAndAccountNumber

      BiFunction<Integer,String,Optional<Loan>> getLoanByLoanNumberAndAccountNumber()
      Function that gets the loan of a client using loan number and account number. The function takes an Integer and a String, the integer containing the loan number, and the string containing the account number.
      Returns:
      an Optional<Loan> whether the loan exist or not.
      See Also:
      • BiFunction
      • Optional
      • Loan

    • getLoanCount

      Function<String,Integer> getLoanCount()
      Function that gets the latest loan count of a client and returns the count. The function takes a String containing the account number that holds a loan.
      Returns:
      a Integer containing the loan count of a client.
      See Also:
      • Function

      default Function<String,Map<String,List<Message>>> getMessage()
